text: The St George Illawarra Dragons are an Australian professional rugby league team. The team is based in St George region of Sydney and the Illawarra region of New South Wales. They were founded in 1998. They currently play in the National Rugby League competition. They have won one premiership in 2010 against the Sydney Roosters. ==Other websites== * Category:National Rugby League Category:Sports clubs and teams in Sydney Category:Wollongong Category:1998 establishments in Australia
title: St George Illawarra Dragons
